actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to make Los Angeles International Airport a priority airport for the purposes of receiving grants for airport noise compatibility planning and programs.
short_title: Priority for LAX Airport Noise Elimination Act

summary.text: Priority for LAX Airport Noise Elimination Act - Amends Federal aviation law to make Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) a priority airport for purposes of receiving grants for airport noise compatibility planning and programs.

titles.title: Priority for LAX Airport Noise Elimination Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to make Los Angeles International Airport a priority airport for the purposes of receiving grants for airport noise compatibility planning and programs.
